parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of all groups created on the following sides [[east]], [[west]], [[resistance]]/[[independent]] and [[civilian]] only. Does not contain groups of [[sideLogic]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''allGroups'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{([[leader]] _x) [[sideChat]] "Go ! Go ! Go !"} [[forEach]] [[allGroups]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> All groups with players: <code>[[private]] _allGroupsWithPlayers = [];
{_allGroupsWithPlayers [[pushBackUnique]] [[group]] _x} [[forEach]] [[allPlayers]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[group]], [[units]], [[allCurators]], [[allDead]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[vehicles]], [[allUnitsUAV]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
